task: Create backend and connect to database
description:
Create Spring Boot app and Task object with the properties: id, name, description, deadline, status and priority.
Connect it to Mysql database.
Create webpage with main screen displaying all the tasks. Create also basic pages for displaying one task and its details, a form to submit new task, and a form to submit changes.

Connect Spring Boot, which is connect to MySql database, to Angular project.
Create CRUD repository and taskServices.
Check if http request goes smoothly.

Done: getTasks, getTask, and addTask.
Put-request created a new Task instead of replacing it; found problem in frontend TaskService, was sending new body.

task: Add feature: sort task by priority or date
description: Already shows list of all created tasks, now want to give the option to sort it on deadline, priority or status.
First check if you can deploy it on your webhost server; or else ask Patrick.
